roleset.name: raise an objection, diatribe

example.name: the one example
example.text: Rival Boston Herald columnist Howie Carr, who [*T*] usually rails at Statehouse ``hacks'' and nepotism, argued that the new drawings were designed to hide Mr. Madden's ``rapidly growing forehead'' and the facial defects of ``chinless'' Dan Shaughnessy, a Globe sports columnist.
example.arg: Rival Boston Herald columnist Howie Carr,

roleset.note: RAIL-V NOTES: Can also be 'rail against' (from rail.01-v)
